original_text: When I was among Jews, I lived like they do, because I wanted to bring Jews to Christ. The Law that God gave to Moses no longer has authority over me. But I chose to obey that Law when I was among Jewish people who obey it. I did that so that I could help them to believe in Christ.
korean_text: 유대인들에게 내가 유대인과 같이 된 것은 유대인들을 얻고자 함이요 율법 아래에 있는 자들에게는 내가 율법 아래에 있지 아니하나 율법 아래에 있는 자 같이 된 것은 율법 아래에 있는 자들을 얻고자 함이요

sentences.original_text: because I wanted to bring Jews to Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 나는 유대인들을 그리스도께 이끌고 싶었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: The Law that God gave to Moses
no longer has authority over me
But I chose to obey that Law
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 그 율법을 순종하기로 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: when I was among Jewish people
so that I could help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 그들을 도울 수 있었습니다
